transcripts.text: As Americans consider the nation's future, as Democrats debate the country's most pressing issues, as voters decide which candidate to support, only one liberal YouTube journalist has reported undercover from inside Trump's rallies.
Only one man is in a relentless pursuit of every Democratic candidate running for American president.
Vice President Biden has reached a bit of a crossroads.
It's about your place in the community.  It's about respect.  During these chaotic times, with America's fate uncertain.
This Sherman Oaks man is accused of spraying protesters with beer repellent at a political rally in Santa Monica.
Independent liberal voices have never been more vital.
Donald Trump has staggering contempt for the democratic institutions that his base stand to salute and send their kids to die for.

And no one on YouTube gets you closer to the facts, closer to the action, closer to the democratic candidates.  Subscribe now to Be Less Stupid.  Liberal politics, investigations, muckraking, science, fact, and funny.
I'm your host, John Hotchkiss.  No one gets you closer.  Be less stupid.
